about_the_game:
| Snow Vale

Snow Vale is survival game with many well-developed game systems, survival in hard conditions, try new strategy tactics, explore new places, fight and more!

| Bulid

Build your dream base to survive cold days!

| Explore

Explore new places on whole map, find good spot for your base to survival cold days!

| Learn Skills

Collect science to learn skills, more than 100 technology points to unlock, From primitive technology to advanced technology!

| Difficult Challenge

Take care of your body temperature and proper nutrition, also take care of clean water,Survive difficult moments, fog, snowstorm or other weather phenomena can happen to you at any time.

| Dangerous Night

Collect items quickly to survive the cold and dangerous night!

| Can you survive on cold dangerous wastelands?

name: Snow Vale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 200 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
